scripts.start: npm run build:libs && ng serve demo
scripts.build:core: ng build @perfectui/toastr --configuration production && ng build @perfectui/dialog --configuration production && ng build core --configuration production
scripts.build:libs: ng build @perfectui/toastr --configuration production && ng build @perfectui/dialog --configuration production && ng build core --configuration production
scripts.build:demo: npm run build:libs && ng build demo --configuration production
scripts.build:all: npm run build:libs && npm run build:demo
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:toastr && npm run publish:dialog && npm run publish:core
